name: Minecraft VMAX S2
description:
[1 to 9] - Select Item [Click] - Place or Mine [WASD] - Move / Jump [E] - Open/Close Inventory [E+hover] - Open / Close Chest, Crafting Table, Door [Space] - Drop single tile from a stack while dragging. [F] - Eat food [N] - Label a sign or chest [Q] - Drop item [P] - Pause / Unpause [T] - Talk / Command [O] - Save your game [M] - Sounds To turn off/on music, use the command /music

Crafting guide: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/645244533/
